https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eyXXl07trsF0ajlXyeShC3cQkgX.jpg A woman falls for a handsome firefighter after he rescues her from a suspicious car crash. But her life spins into tragedy after his seemingly overprotective behavior burns through her life. Burning Lies
